programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Bath Rugby begin their Gallagher PREM title defence as they travel to face Harlequins at Twickenham Stoop. Bath won a 47-28 thriller when these sides last went head-to-head.

programme.desc: Action from UFC Fight Night at RAC Arena in Perth, Australia, featuring the light heavyweight bout between Carlos Ulberg and Dominick Reyes.

programme.desc: Action from the AFLW as Brisbane Lions meet Richmond at Brighton Homes Arena. The Tigers are looking to avoid a seventh defeat in a row.
